headline: BancFirst, Bath and Body Works, Brown-Forman, Warner Bros. Discovery, and Lululemon Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after the second quarter (2025) earnings season got off to a strong start. Quarterly earnings reports released during the week exceeded Wall Street's expectations, fueling investor confidence. Around 50 S&P 500 components reported, with 88% of those exceeding analysts' expectations, FactSet data revealed. Investors were also encouraged by several positive reports that painted a picture of a resilient consumer. One key report revealed that shoppe
